Health Connect permissions not granted. We can not read data
For using all app functionality you should download Health Connect application

Hello, I\'m Boram Lim, a professor at Hanyang University\'s School of Business who studies consumer behavior using big data. Through this application, my research team will study how consumers use their smartphones. When you install the mobile app on your smartphone, we will collect data on how your apps are being used. The data collected will not be used for any purpose other than academic research and will not be shared with any third parties. We do not collect any information that can identify you, so there are no risks associated with participating in the study. The security and stability of the app have been thoroughly verified by Prof. Lim\'s research team.


Only participants who do not uninstall it by the end of the two-month study period will receive a coupon for a free Starbucks coffee.


This study was approved by the Institutional Review Board (IRB) of Hanyang Univer- sity, and if you have any questions about the study or experience any risks or dis- comfort, please contact the principal investigator below. All responsibility is with Prof. Boram Lim\'s laboratory.


Principal Investigator: Bo-Ram Lim, Professor of Marketing, Hanyang University
Contact: 02-2220-1076


You can find more detailed information about the study through the link below.
